name: Pocket
title: A visual cheat-sheet for the 36 keyboard shortcuts found on Pocket for Web

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A visual cheat-sheet for the 36 keyboard shortcuts found on Pocket for Web

cards.title: Viewing Your List
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                |
| -------- | --------------------- |
| `G` `L`  | Go to My List         |
| `G` `A`  | Go to Archive         |
| `G` `F`  | Go to Favorites       |
| `G` `R`  | Go to Articles        |
| `G` `H`  | Go to Highlights      |
| `G` `V`  | Go to Videos          |
| `G` `T`  | Go to All Tags        |
| `G` `S`  | Go to Search          |
| `G` `B`  | Bulk Edit             |
| `G` `U`  | Save a URL            |
| `S` `N`  | Sort by Newest        |
| `S` `O`  | Sort by Oldest        |
| `V` `L`  | List View             |
| `V` `G`  | Grid View             |
| `V` `D`  | Detail View           |
| `C` `L`  | Change to Light Theme |
| `C` `D`  | Change to Dark Theme  |
| `C` `S`  | Change to Sepia Theme |
| `?`      | Open Help Overlay     |

cards.title: Item Actions
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                         |
| -------- | ------------------------------ |
| `O`      | Open the original in a new tab |
| `A`      | Archive the selected item      |
| `F`      | Favorite the selected item     |
| `T`      | Tag the selected item          |
| `D`      | Delete the selected item       |
| `X`      | Select item in bulk edit       |
| `J`      | Select the next item           |
| `K`      | Select the previous item       |

cards.title: Article View
cards.body:
| Shortcut   | Action                                   |
| ---------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| `Ctrl` `=` | Increase the font size                   |
| `Ctrl` `-` | Decrease the font size                   |
| `B`        | Toggle full screen mode                  |
| `D`        | Edit tags                                |
| `T`        | Archive the item                         |
| `F`        | Favorite the item                        |
| `O`        | View the original                        |
| `Alt` `=`  | Increase the column width (premium only) |
| `Alt` `-`  | Decrease the column width (premium only) |
